name: vscode-unity-color-preview
description: Inline color previews for Unity's Color and Color32 constructors in C# (e.g., new Color(0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.25f))

unityColorPreview.showHighlightColor.description: Highlight occurrences with the detected color as background or underline.

unityColorPreview.highlightOpacity.description: Opacity of the highlight overlay when highlighting colors.

unityColorPreview.highlightStyle.description: Rendering style for highlights: background fill or underline.

unityColorPreview.showOverviewRulerColor.description: Show color marks in the editor overview ruler for detected colors.

unityColorPreview.preferredFormat.description: Preferred constructor format in the quick color presentations.

unityColorPreview.floatPrecision.description: Number of decimal places for float components in Color presentations.

unityColorPreview.includeAlphaByDefault.description: List alpha-including presentations before non-alpha ones.

unityColorPreview.enableNamedColors.description: Detect and preview named colors like Color.red, Color.white, Color.clear.

author: Clockworked

scripts.optimize-gif: gifsicle --optimize=3 --colors=128 --lossy=80 media/color-preview.gif -o media/color-preview-optimized.gif && mv media/color-preview-optimized.gif media/color-preview.gif
scripts.check-gif: echo 'GIF file size:' && ls -lh media/color-preview.gif && echo 'GIF dimensions:' && gifsicle --info media/color-preview.gif | head -5
